name: DieNasty Warriors
description:
Loosely inspired by the Dynasty Warriors game franchise, DieNasty Warriors is Positioning-driven RPG where you play as a warrior represented by a die and roll around the field to mow through waves of enemies. 

Attack by crashing into enemies with your biggest number on top, and block damage by ending your turn with the smallest number on top. 

Deal or take damage to fill your Ultimate Gauge and  Turn the tide of battle with powerful Ultimates.

The game was intended to have three different playable characters, each with unique attack and defense mechanics.  Each character was also supposed to have a unique tech tree that enables different playstyle. If you want a more fleshed-out version of this game, be sure to leave a comment below!

Enjoy the Jam.

Game by: 

Wang Yuanhao (Leo)

Tao Rongyi (Alan)

Wang Jianan (Jackson)

Yang Yuchen (Andrew)

Mo You (Woody)
